Verses: 1 andriyum, Mudhalaam Udanpadikkaiyaanadhu Aaraadhanaikketra Muraimaigalum Boomikkuriya Parisuththa Sthalamum Udaiyadhaayirundhadhu.
2 eppadiyenil, Oru Koodaaram Undaakkappattirundhadhu; Adhin Mundhina Paagaththil Kuththuvilakkum, Mejaiyum, Dhevasamugaththappangalum Irundhana; Adhu Parisuththa Sthalamennappadum.
3 irandaan Thiraikkulle Magaa Parisuththa Sthalamennappatta Koodaaram Irundhadhu.

4 adhile Ponnaarseydha Thoobakalasamum, Muzhuvadhum Potragadu Podhindhirukkappatta Udanpadikkaip Pettiyum Irundhana; Andhap Pettiyile Mannaa Vaikkappatta Porpaaththiramum, Aaronudaiya Thalirththa Kolum, Udanpadikkaiyin Karpalagaigalum Irundhana.
5 adharku Mele Magimaiyulla Kerubeengal Vaikkappattu Kirubaasanaththai Nizhalittirundhana; Ivaigalaik Kuriththu Vivaramaaippesa Ippozhudhu Samayamillai.
6 ivaigal Ivvidhamaai Aayaththamaakkappattirukka, Aasaariyargal Aaraadhanai Muraimaigalai Niraivetrumpadikku Mudhalaankoodaaraththile Niththamum Piravesippaargal.

7 irandaankoodaaraththile Piradhaana Aasaariyanmaaththiram Varushaththirku Orudharam Raththaththode Piravesiththu, Andha Raththaththaith Thanakkaagavum Janangaludaiya Thappidhangalukkaagavum Seluththuvaan.
8 adhinaale, Mudhalaankoodaaram Nirkumalavum Parisuththa Sthalaththirkuppogira Maarkkam Innum Velippadavillaiyendru Parisuththa Aaviyaanavar Theriyappaduththiyirukkiraar.

9 andhak Koodaaram Ikkaalaththirku Udhavugira Oppanaiyaayirukkiradhu; Adharketrapadiye Seluththappattuvarugira Kaanikkaigalum Baligalum Aaraadhanai Seygiravanudaiya Manasaatchiyaip Pooranappaduththakkoodaadhavaigalaam.
10 ivaigal Seerthiruthal Undaagum Kaalamvaraikkum Nadandherumpadi Kattalaiyidappatta Pojanapaanangalum, Palavidha Snaanangalum, Sareeraththirketra Sadangugalumeyallaamal Veralla.

11 kiristhuvaanavar Varappogira Nanmaigalukkuriya Piradhaana Aasaariyaraai Velippattu, Kaiyinaal Seyyappattadhaagiya Indha Sirushtisambandhamaana Koodaaraththin Vazhiyaaga Alla, Peridhum Uththamamumaana Koodaaraththin Vazhiyaagavum,
12 vellaattukkadaa, Ilankaalai Ivaigaludaiya Raththaththinaale Alla, Thammudaiya Sondha Raththaththinaalum Oredharam Magaa Parisuththa Sthalaththile Piravesiththu, Niththiya Meetpai Undupanninaar.
13 adheppadiyenil, Kaalai Vellaattukkadaa Ivaigalin Raththamum, Theettuppattavargalmel Thelikkappatta Kadaariyin Saambalum, Sareerasuththiyundaagumpadi Parisuththappaduththumaanaal,

14 niththiya Aaviyinaale Thammaiththaame Pazhudhatra Baliyaaga Dhevanukku Oppukkoduththa Kiristhuvinudaiya Raththam Jeevanulla Dhevanukku Oozhiyanjeyvadharku Ungal Manasaatchiyai Seththakkiriyaigalarach Suththigarippadhu Evvalavu Nichchayam!

15 aagaiyaal Mudhalaam Udanpadikkaiyin Kaalaththile Nadandha Akkiramangalai Nivirththiseyyumporuttu Avar Maranamadaindhu, Azhaikkappattavargal Vaakkuththaththampannappatta Niththiya Sudhandharaththai Adaindhukolvadharkaaga, Pudhu Udanpadikkaiyin Maththiyastharaayirukkiraar.
16 enendraal, Enge Maranasaadhanamundo, Ange Andha Saadhanaththai Ezhudhinavanudaiya Maranamum Undaagavendum.
17 eppadiyenil, Maranamundaanapinbe Maranasaadhanam Urudhippadum; Adhai Ezhudhinavan Uyirodirukkaiyil Adharkup Belanillaiye.
18 andhappadi, Mudhalaam Udanpadikkaiyum Iraththamillaamal Piradhishtaipannappadavillai.

19 eppadiyenil, Mose, Niyaayappiramaanaththinpadi, Sagala Janangalukkum Ellaak Kattalaigalaiyum Sonnapinbu, Ilankaalai Vellaattukkadaa Ivaigalin Raththaththaith Thanneerodum, Sivappaana Aattumayirodum, Eesoppodunkooda Eduththu Pusthagaththinmelum Janangalellaarmelum Theliththu:
20 dhevan Ungalukku, Kattalaiyitta Udanpadikkaiyin Iraththam Idhuve Endru Sonnaan.
21 ivvidhamaaga, Koodaaraththinmelum Aaraadhanaikkuriya Sagala Panimoottugalilmelum Raththaththaith Theliththaan.
22 niyaayappiramaanaththinpadi Konjankuraiya Ellaam Raththaththinaale Suththigarikkappadum; Raththanjsindhudhalillaamal Mannippu Undaagaadhu.

23 aadhalaal, Paralogaththilullavaigalukku Saayalaanavaigal Ippadippatta Baligalinaale Suththigarikkappadavendiyadhaayirundhadhu; Paralogaththilullavaigalo Ivaigalilum Viseshiththa Baligalaale Suththigarikkappadavendiyadhaame.

24 andhappadi, Meyyaana Parisuththa Sthalaththukku Adaiyaalamaana Kaiyinaal Seyyappattadhaayirukkira Parisuththa Sthalaththile Kiristhuvaanavar Piravesiyaamal, Paralogaththiledhaane Ippozhudhu Namakkaaga Dhevanudaiya Samugaththil Piraththiyatchamaagumpadi Piravesiththirukkiraar.
25 piradhaana Aasaariyan Anniya Iraththaththode Varushandhorum Parisuththa Sthalaththukkul Piravesikkiradhupola, Avar Anegandharam Thammai Paliyidumpadikku Piravesikkavillai.

26 appadiyirundhadhaanaal, Ulagamundaanadhu Mudharkondu Avar Anegandharam Paadupadavendiyadhaayirukkume; Appadiyalla, Avar Thammaiththaame Baliyidugiradhinaale Paavangalai Neekkumporuttaaga Indha Kadaisikkaalaththil Oredharam Velippattaar.
27 andriyum, Oredharam Marippadhum, Pinbu Niyaayaththeerppadaivadhum, Manusharukku Niyamikkappattirukkirapadiye,

28 kiristhuvum Anegarudaiya Paavangalai Sumandhu Theerkkumpadikku Oredharam Baliyidappattu, Thamakkaaga Kaaththukkondirukkiravargalukku Ratchippai Arulumpadi Irandaandharam Paavamillaamal Dharisanamaavaar.
